name: Hairless Soon
description:
Help! The lice village is in danger! It seems the organism our little lice inhabit has been infested with circular hair loss. But our brave little farmer louse Hans wants to help: thankully he knows how to grow the precious hair back! The magic lucky streaks will prevent our little lice village from going bald. Grab some seeds and plant new roots to save the head from turning barren!

Save the lice village and let it grow again!
